title: Macron hosts Trump, Musk at Notre-Dame ceremony in Paris
shortDescription: Joined by French President Macron, President-elect Donald Trump brings Elon Musk to Notre-Dame's reopening ceremony in Paris on Saturday.

title: Trump says US should stay out of Syrian conflict: 'Not our fight'
shortDescription: Rebel forces are waging a new offensive against Syrian President Bashar al-Assad in the country's long running civil war.

title: Trump's triumphant red carpet return to meet French President Macron
shortDescription: Donald Trump gets the red carpet treatment from French President Emmanuel Macron in Paris ahead of Notre Dame Cathedral ceremony.

title: Republicans giddy, Dems wary as Musk and Ramaswamy schmooze Congress
shortDescription: Republican lawmakers say they’re confident Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy will lead the DOGE with integrity.

title: South Korea President Yoon survives impeachment vote post martial law
shortDescription: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol survives an impeachment motion in parliament on Saturday after members of his party boycotted the vote.

title: Parties, influence, plans: Inside Trump's Mar-a-Lago private club
shortDescription: Recent visitors to Trump's private club include Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, Elon Musk, RFK Jr., and Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene.

title: How could Trump's election affect his $600 million civil losses?
shortDescription: President-elect Trump's November victory at the polls has helped him in his criminal cases. But will it do the same for him in his civil cases?

title: 'Yes, I do' Trump remains confident in Hegseth as defense nominee
shortDescription: Donald Trump says on Meet the Press that he is sticking by Pete Hegseth, his embattled choice for defense secretary, even as allies suggest doubts.

title: How Harris and Trump spent their campaign cash in 2024's final dash
shortDescription: Democrats are questioning whether Kamala Harris' campaign spent her money wisely against Trump - and new FEC records add fuel to their debate.

title: Fabricated Trudeau post shows Trump falling off a cliff | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no record of the post on the verified account belonging to the Canadian prime minister.

title: Trump allies believe Hegseth unlikely to win Senate confirmation
shortDescription: Trump praised Hegseth, saying "his support is strong and deep." But sources close to the president-elect say Hegseth's nomination is in trouble.

title: Trump appoints Rodney Scott as new Customs and Border Protection chief
shortDescription: Rodney Scott was pushed out by the Biden administration in 2021 and would oversee one of America's largest law enforcement agencies.

title: Jewish Americans have harder time getting jobs, study says: What can Trump do?
shortDescription: A new study from the ADL found workplace hiring discrimination. What can Trump do in his second term to help?

title: Want a VIP invite to Trump's inauguration? That'll cost you.
shortDescription: Top donors to Trump's inaugural committee can snag invites for dinners with the president-elect and his wife, and tickets to the big event Jan. 20.

title: Trump admin's deregulation plans may harm animals
shortDescription: Donald Trump hasn’t been talking about specific animal welfare policies, but animal welfare advocates say there's cause for concern.

title: These Ohio Republicans want to replace VP-elect JD Vance in the Senate
shortDescription: Several Republicans are eager to replace Vice President-elect JD Vance in the U.S. Senate. Gov. Mike DeWine hasn't said who he's considering.

title: Fauci, Cheney, Milley: Whom could Biden preemptively pardon?
shortDescription: President Joe Biden is reportedly considering preemptive pardons to head off Trump's "retribution." Who could be on Biden's list?

title: Democrats running for DNC chair make cases at party meeting
shortDescription: Democrats presented a long list of ideas for rebuilding their party on Thursday

title: Trump to nominate former Sen. David Perdue as China ambassador
shortDescription: Trump's pick of David Perdue comes as president-elect promises new tariffs on China and to take a more aggressive approach to a geopolitical rival.

title: Bahamas 'firmly rejected' Trump deportation proposal: prime minister
shortDescription: Bahamas Prime Minister Philip Davis said the country 'firmly rejected' a Trump transition proposal to deport immigrants from other countries there.

title: Melania Trump praises Barron Trump's 2024 advisor role
shortDescription: Returning as first lady, Melania Trump said her 18-year-old only child gave his father helpful advice on reaching young voters.

title: Elon Musk gave groups backing Trump over $250 million, records show
shortDescription: The world's richest person, Elon Musk, contributed more than a quarter-billion dollars to campaign committees that helped Trump win a second term.
